name: super wall gunner
description:
this is a top down shooter made for ludum dare 42. 

you are in an arena and most fight monsters forever luckily you have  the super wall gun a gun that terns enemies into walls,

this game is an arcade top down shooter were when you kill an enemy they tern into a wall,

W,A,S,D to move

left mouse to shoot

R to reload you will reload  automatically when you run out off ammo\

edit: i fixed a bug that were enemies teleport sometimes when they hit a wall
